messages.content: What is the time limit for the final exam?
The time limit for the final exam is 2 hours.
How many questions will be on the final exam?
The final exam will consist of 50 multiple-choice questions.
Are we allowed to use textbooks during the final exam?
The final exam is closed book, so you are not allowed to use textbooks or any other materials.
Will the final exam cover all the chapters?
Yes, the final exam will cover all the chapters discussed in the course.
Can we take the final exam from home?
Yes, you can take the final exam from home using Respondus LockDown Browser.
What is the email address of the teaching assistant?
The email address of the teaching assistant is ta@example.com.
How can I schedule a meeting with the instructor?
You can schedule a meeting with the instructor by emailing mccallun@uoguelph.ca.
What is the phone number to reach the instructor?
The phone number to reach the instructor is 555-1234.
How do I join the instructor's office hours?
You can join the instructor's office hours via the Zoom link provided on CourseLink.
Where can I find the instructor's contact information?
The instructor's contact information is available on the course syllabus and on CourseLink.
